TopicTitle: Designing and building of a Kerbal Controller

Articles.Content:
Me and a friend are dedicated to designing and building our own kerbal custom controller, and at the same time trying to integrate a better multiplayer expirience by the introduction of a mission control that can operate independently of the pilot and yet beable to communicate back and forth. For more information, or to ask more questions join us on our blog where we will keep everyone updated with our progress.

Blog: http://Kerbalkontroller.blogspot.ca
